name: Vietnam War PuZZles
description:
In this game you need to collect Vietnamese puzzles. Puzzles are different - with American soldiers, with Vetnam soldiers, with helicopters and so on. Also, it's possible that you will catch a flashback.
Features:
-Game genre: puzzles
-Tematics: Vietnam War
-Vietnam, US soldiers - everything is in the game
-Different puzzles
-Simple and fun gameplay (just drag and drop the elements of puzzles - thereby you collect the picture)
-You will be able to catch flashbacks from the Vietnam War, as well as relax
-Powerful engine Unreal Engine
-Steam achievements
-Good soundtrack
